strapiPost.title: New Mixed-Use Project To Commence On Walton Blvd
strapiPost.content:
Walton Boulevard in Bentonville is in for a $51mm investment for what some are calling a renaissance for the street. 

  • Downtown living: A 6.5-acre site between Chick-fil-a and Panda Express has been purchased by a real estate development firm and will be Walton Blvdâ€™s first large multi-family project called Lumen. The front of the site will face Walton and the back will reach the Bentonville Cemetery. 
  • Lifestyle: Lumen will be over 281k sq/ft of retail and restaurant space in addition to 252 residential units amidst amenities such as a dog park, a resort pool, and more. Construction is set to start in the coming weeks. 

Read more about the development HERE.
